issue.title: [CF 184] New localization phrases
issue.body:
add the new localization phrases please!^.^ thank you.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #184 | Raw

comments.body:
They are automatically put in every time I upload a new version. Next should be coming within an hour. Thank you for all your hard work in making TMW easily accessible and usable for many more people!

EDIT: Oh, were you talking about the English phrases so that you can translate them? Just put them up.

Edited Apr 27, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

^.^I translated more than 95% of zhTW and 40% of zhCN localization phrases.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

thanks again.it's ok now.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl
